Goal Representation: Turn on the lights in the bedroom. Then turn on the lights in the bathroom.
['1. Turn on the lights in the bedroom.', '2. Turn on the lights in the bathroom.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bedroom: item where:
            is_bedroom(bedroom)
        
        bind light: item where:
            is_light(light) and has_switch(light) and inside(light, bedroom)
        
        achieve is_on(light)

['1. Find the light switch in the bedroom and turn on the lights.', '2. Find the light switch in the
 bathroom and turn on the lights.']

behavior find_and_turn_on_switch(switch: item):
    body:
        observe(switch, "Find the light switch in the bedroom")
        achieve is_on(switch)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind light_switch: item where:
            is_light(light_switch) and has_switch(light_switch) and inside(light_switch, bedroom)
        find_and_turn_on_switch(light_switch)
